events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case was reviewed and categorized under the refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request submitted by the customer.
Hello, thank you for contacting support. I understand you would like a refund because you received the wrong item.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number to proceed with the refund?
I have attached the photo of the incorrect product and included my order number in the reply.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for the prompt help! I appreciate your assistance with this refund.
The refund has now been fully processed and confirmed. Please let us know if you need any further help.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory on your end.
Closing the case now as the refund issue has been resolved and confirmed by the customer.
